channel.title: WebProject - RS2 PHP/MySql
channel.description:
Starting a brand new project that will be a clone of the runescape website, have all the same features, high scores, forums, login etc. If you are a experienced server developer with MySql and can help with the functions please can you PM me with your msn, So we can get to work.
[b]About the project:[/b] This project will be written in php using a mysql connection to the game database to relay data back and forth. This project is subject to be opensource.
- Nick Winstanley
